Key Match Events: Jonatan Clase hit his first career home run
Kevin Gausman threw six strong innings
Alejandro Kirk drove in three runs
Post-Match Reflections: John Schneider praised Jonatan Clase's performance
Jarren Duran expressed pride in the Red Sox team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jonatan Clase was acquired from Seattle last July
The game ended a five-game losing streak for the Blue Jays
The loss eliminated the Red Sox from post-season contention
Others: Richard Fitts made his fourth career start for Boston
Nathan Lukes dropped his second sacrifice bunt of the game
Kirk's 17-game hitting streak is a career high and the longest active streak in the American League
